info.name: dgs
info.description: thisdp's directx graphic user interface system
info.author: DGS Community

setting.name: *testFile
setting.desc: Enable or disable loading of DGS test file.

setting.name: *compatibilityChecks
setting.desc: Enable or disable compatibility check warnings.

setting.name: *updateCheck
setting.desc: Enable or disable automatic update checks.

setting.name: *updateCheckInterval
setting.desc: Interval in minutes between automatic update checks.

setting.name: *updateCheckNoticeInterval
setting.desc: Interval in minutes between update check notices.

setting.name: *updateCommand
setting.desc: Command to trigger a DGS update.

setting.name: *updater
setting.desc: Enable or disable the DGS update system.

setting.name: *metaBackup
setting.desc: Enable or disable backup of meta.xml when updating.

setting.name: *metaStyleBackup
setting.desc: Enable or disable backup of style files from meta.xml when updating.

setting.name: *G2DCMD
setting.desc: Enable or disable GUI to DGS command line.

setting.name: *CMD
setting.desc: Enable or disable DGS built-in CMD /dgscmd.
